messages.content: I already have a job at UPS but my sisters looking for a job

Hi Aidan I know this is super random lmao but I work for a small business in Farmington. Because of COVID our team is working entirely remotely. The starting pay for the job is 17$ and the schedules are flexible to work around classes or other commitments. We have openings and I told my boss I would help spread the word. Are you or anyone you know currently looking for work over winter break?
